name: BrainPickersThemeTuneChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open Theme Tune Challenge”
”new theme tune”
”skip theme tune”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: theme tune challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Guess the TV Theme Tunes from the short clips and clues you hear. Answer quickly to get the most points and climb the world leaderboards!

You get a clip of the theme tune, along with a blurred image, word reveal and a riddle to help you to guess! 

The shows are handpicked and curated for the US and you have the choice to include British shows to your questions. 

Features include:

- Curated themes and Alexa will recognize the title from your answer. Alexa is also lenient if you don't get the exact name correct!
- Add themes that you like to your favorites and view them online at our BrainPickers.co.uk website.
- View your worldwide leaderboard score online.
- Repeat, or skip questions.

Premium features:

- You can access new questions, each include a clip, image and a riddle. There are many new questions to enjoy and new ones are always being added.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
